DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample cerebrospinal fluid patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study study cerebrospinal fluid protein angiogenesis protein young patient newly diagnose central nervous system tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Cerebrospinal Fluid Proteins Angiogenesis Proteins Young Patients With Newly Diagnosed Central Nervous System Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Investigate feasibility centrally collect process high-quality cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) sample pediatric patient newly diagnose central nervous system tumor proteomic study . - Identify protein marker might indicate presence brain tumor use CSF sample collect patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) collection follow 5 site : lumbar , cervical , ommaya , intra-operative ( ventricular , cisternal ) , and/or external ventricular drain . CSF obtain within 8 week diagnosis prior ( concurrent ) initiation post-operative therapy ( exclude corticosteroid ) . CSF sample examine proteomic biomarkers 2D gel electrophoresis , low-mass fingerprinting , stable isotope label . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 99 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm CNS tumor follow histology : Diffuse pontine gliomas* Focal/infiltrative tumor , include follow : High lowgrade glioma Gangliogliomas Ependymomas Oligodendrogliomas Craniopharyngioma Dysembryoplastic neuroepithelial tumor Other lowgrade neoplasm Optic pathway gliomas* Seeding tumor , include follow : Germ cell tumor ( germinomas nongerminomas ) Embryonal tumor , include follow : Medulloblastoma Pineoblastoma Supratentorial primitive neuroectodermal tumor Atypical teratoid/rhabdoid tumor Other embryonal tumor NOTE : *Histological requirement waive Newly diagnose disease Cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) obtain part CSF diversion , initial diagnosis/staging , administration intrathecal chemotherapy ( initiation postoperative therapy ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Less 22 year age PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No prior radiotherapy chemotherapy Prior corticosteroid allow
